title: Mobile Usage Details Schema
description: Schema for extracting mobile usage details, specifically voice call records, from a markdown document.

voice_usage_records.title: Voice Usage Records
voice_usage_records.description: An array of individual voice call usage records.

items.title: Voice Usage Record
items.description: Details for a single voice call.

date.title: Date
date.description: The date of the voice call.

time.title: Time
time.description: The time of the voice call in HH:MM format.

called_location.title: Called Location
called_location.description: The geographical location associated with the call.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The duration of the call in minutes and seconds (MM:SS).
